oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thorncrown Chapel in Eureka Springs, Arkansas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color image of Thorncrown Chapel in Eureka Springs, Arkansas.

“Donated by the estate of Mrs. Georgia Louis Price -- May 2011 [handwritten] -- Thorncrown Chapel -- Route 2, Box 40 -- Eureka Springs, Arkansas 72632 -- U.S. 62 West -- All people are welcome to the little glass mountainside chapel, a beautiful natural presentation of God’s creation, Voted National Honor Award 1981. The chapel is a donation to all people by Mr. & Mrs. Jim Reed. Architects: E. Fay Jones Associates [typed/pre-printed]”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Thorncrown Chapel; churches; chapels; religion; Eureka Springs, Arkansas;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Photo by Hursley & Lark
